content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no additional drill found) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities (like burner-mining-drill, burner-inserter) have fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities (like stone-furnace) have ingredients before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that steam engine is connected to a power source before attempting to use it
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
